name: Slate Office REIT 9.00% Convertible Unsecured Subordinated Debentures
longDescription: Slate Office REIT (REIT) is a Canada-based unincorporated, open-ended real estate investment trust. The REIT is an owner and operator of workplace real estate. The REIT owns interests in and operates a portfolio of strategic and well-located real estate assets in North America and Europe. The REIT's portfolio consists of approximately 53 commercial properties located in North America and Europe. Its portfolio is comprised of government and credit tenants. Its geographical segments include Atlantic, Ontario, Western, United States and Ireland.
fulldescription: Slate Office REIT (REIT) is a Canada-based unincorporated, open-ended real estate investment trust. The REIT is an owner and operator of workplace real estate. The REIT owns interests in and operates a portfolio of strategic and well-located real estate assets in North America and Europe. The REIT's portfolio consists of approximately 53 commercial properties located in North America and Europe. Its portfolio is comprised of government and credit tenants. Its geographical segments include Atlantic, Ontario, Western, United States and Ireland. The REIT is externally managed and operated by Slate Management ULC.
